name: book gecko
notes:
please note that the paid pattern is the ad-free and printable pdf version of a free online pattern on supergurumi.com.

**free english version**
https://www.supergurumi.com/amigurumi-crochet-gecko-bookmark

**free german version**
https://www.supergurumi.de/amigurumi-gecko-lesezeichen-haekeln

**free spanish version**
https://www.supergurumi.com/es/patron-de-crochet-lagartija-marcapaginas-amigurumi

**free french version**
https://www.supergurumi.com/fr/tutoriel-marque-page-gecko-au-crochet-gecko-livre

**free dutch version**
https://www.supergurumi.com/nl/gekko-boekenlegger-haken

the **book gecko**, involuntary bookmark with absolute eye-catching guarantee!
  
**about the pattern:**
 
• the crochet pattern comes as a printable pdf and is available in english (us terminology), german, spanish, french and dutch.
• the pattern is written in detail and extensively illustrated.
• available as an instant download after purchase!	
• the finished bookmark has a length of approximately 31 cm.
 
**materials used:**
 
this pattern was crocheted using the „schachenmayr catania“ yarn (100% cotton, meterage: 125 m, yarn ball weight: 50 g, yarn weight: sport - 5ply / fine (2)) in the following colors:
 
• black (schwarz (110))
• white (weiß (106))
• golf green (golfgrün (241))
 
• 2.5 mm crochet hook
• tapestry needle
• polyfill
• scissors
 
**techniques you need to know:**
 
• magic ring
• chain stitch
• slip stitch
• single crochet (sc)
• half double crochet
• double crochet
• decrease / increase
• sewing
 
***have fun crocheting!***
